channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Like a Horror Movie’: Gazans Return Home After Cease-Fire
item.description: Two young Gazans, Aya Ehab Zaid and Abed Alaziz Hunaif, embarked on a long journey to return to their homes after nearly 16 months of war in Gaza.

item.title: How a Sale of TikTok Would Work and Who Might Buy It
item.description: A new law says TikTok must be sold to a non-Chinese owner or face a ban in the United States. President Trump has thrown out a lot of options for a po...

item.title: Salesforce cutting 1,000 roles while hiring salespeople for AI
item.description: Technology companies have grown more accustomed to regular job reductions after a massive wave of layoffs at the start of 2023.

item.title: America’s air traffic controllers are in short supply—Those who qualify can make $137,000 annually, with no bachelor’s required
item.description: Expensive, grueling, and time-consuming training has exacerbated a windfall of controllers.

item.title: How Trump Is Reshaping U.S. Government, Just 2 Weeks Into His Presidency

item.title: Buffalo Bills Fans Have It Tough, Especially in Antarctica
item.description: Research scientists in remote locations need to get creative in order to follow their favorite teams, even when they don’t like the outcomes.

item.title: Chris Wright Is Confirmed as Secretary of Energy
item.description: The former fracking executive said in confirmation hearings that his top priority would be to “unleash” American energy production.

item.title: Investors are growing anxious about Novo Nordisk’s silence since disappointing CagriSema weight loss drug results
item.description: Investors are upset at a lack of clarity over the results of Wegovy successor CagriSema after trials published in December.
